hero.title: Unlocking Liquidity for Your Global Mineral Holdings
hero.subtitle: Empowering mineral owners worldwide with a seamless path to liquidity.
hero.description: MXTK, short for Mineral Token, stands as a pioneering force in the realm of asset-backed cryptocurrency, dedicated to unlocking liquidity for mineral asset owners across the globe. Through a seamless and transparent process, we empower asset holders by minting 1:1 asset-backed Mineral Tokens, facilitating their trade on prominent crypto marketplaces. As your partner in liquidity solutions, MXTK transforms mineral wealth into a tangible and tradeable digital currency, bridging the gap between traditional mineral assets and the evolving world of cryptocurrency.

opportunity.heading: Opportunity
points: Vast mineral wealth exists worldwide both within mines and unmined.
Prices and values of mines and minerals are rising exponentially.
Monetizing these assets could unlock significant capital for wealth generation pre-extraction.

problem.heading: The Problem
points: Selling assets can lead to loss of ownership and control.
Finding trustworthy buyers can be challenging.
Traditional financing options are limited for both mined and unmined assets.

solution.heading: The Solution
solution.description: We offer mineral asset owners liquidity by minting 1:1 asset-backed Mineral Tokens (MXTK), which can be traded on crypto marketplaces.

investment_opportunity.heading: Investment Opportunity
subpoints: Global mineral demand is soaring; with Mineral Token (MXTK), investors can tap into this rising market.
Our tokens offer a diversified mineral asset blend, reducing risks and increasing the potential for long-term gains.
Mineral Token (MXTK) links investors to global mineral assets, offering diverse opportunities.
As mineral asset owners gain liquidity, investors can profit from rising mineral demand and prices, benefiting both parties.

how_it_works.heading: How it works
steps: Our Third-party experts independently appraise and validate mineral assets. (Asset Verification)
Convert your mineral assets to MXTK tokens on a 1:1 basis & secure the SKR and/or deeds. (MXTK Tokens & Lock)
Trade or sell tokens on global crypto exchanges. (Liquidity)

requirements.heading: What is required
options: 43-101 REPORT: Includes detailed geological and technical assessments, ensuring transparency and reliability.
JORC REPORT: Provides guidelines for the public reporting of exploration results, mineral resources, and ore reserves.
SKR (SAFE KEEPING RECEIPT): Proves ownership of mineral assets securely held.

fees.heading: Pricing and Fees
structure: Liquidity Fee: The Liquidity Fee covers the setup, validation, and conversion of your mineral assets into tradable tokens on crypto exchanges, streamlining liquidity generation.

Network Gas Fee: The Network Gas Fee covers ongoing support, compliance, and transaction costs for selling Tokens on crypto exchanges, ensuring your assets' continued support and compliance on Mineral Token.
No Hidden Costs: At Mineral Token, we value transparency with no hidden fees.

about.heading: About
about.content:
Mineral Token was founded by the leadership of BV INNOVATION, which has deep experience in cryptocurrency, finance, and working in the mining industry. Over $33 Billion in mineral assets were committed at launch.

"BV INNOVATION is making big bets in AI, mineral extraction and refinement, and clean energy solutions, among others. As the world moves from fossil fuels to new energy solutions, we are only beginning the journey. With Mineral Token, stakeholders in the marketplace can move faster to bring the resources to market. We see it as a natural extension of our investment strategy." — Bo Vargas
